fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: If the legislature is bicameral, which chamber is dominant?

fxInfo_responses.value: The lower chamber is clearly dominant.
The lower chamber is somewhat more powerful on most issues.
They are roughly co-equal in power.
The upper chamber is somewhat more powerful on most issues.
The upper chamber is clearly dominant.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2lgdomchm, *_osp, *_ord
